attributes.action: take urgent action in the fight against violent crime, especially knives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Too many people are dying on our streets because mindless individuals think it's funny to carry knives around. As much as the police are trying their best; I don't think the goverment are putting enough initiatives into place to try and prevent this from happening again. 
Day in, day out we see news articles of stabbings - someone else has died. 
It's become a trend, especially in London - and the government need to put a stop to it.
